headline: Nucor forecasts lower-than-expected fourth-quarter profit
summary: U.S. steelmaker Nucor forecast fourth-quarter profit below Wall Street estimates on Monday, citing a slump in earnings in their steel mills segment caused by decreased volumes and lower average selling prices. The company expects fourth-quarter earnings to be in a range of $0.55 to $0.65 per diluted share, lower than analysts' estimates of $0.90 per share, according to data compiled by LSEG. However, it expects earnings in its raw materials segment to increase year-over-year in the fourth quarter.

headline: Nucor Announces Guidance for the Fourth Quarter of 2024 Earnings
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE: NUE) today announced guidance for its fourth quarter ending December 31, 2024. Nucor expects fourth quarter earnings to be in the range of $0.55 to $0.65 per diluted share. Nucor reported net earnings of $1.05 per diluted share in the third quarter of 2024 and $3.16 per diluted share in the fourth quarter of 2023.
